entry.title: StreamWidget/SW-Example-React-JSX: A simple React JSX template designed to compile into a single bundled file. This lightweight setup is perfect for creating reusable modules, with a clear structure for easy integration and deployment. Ideal for developers looking for a quick-start foundation for React projects.
entry.content: A simple React JSX template designed to compile into a single bundled file. This lightweight setup is perfect for creating reusable modules, with a clear structure for easy integration and deployment. Ideal for developers looking for a quick-start foundation for React projects.
